channel.title: Personals on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Personals on Blog

item.title: More Stuff That Happened
item.description: the weather is still the same i bought more clothes from uniqlo, mission failed went to a babymetal concert thinking that it wasnt going to be a metal concert crowd it was a metal concert crowd i felt both incredibly safe and in an insane amount of danger the people were nice and helped each other out the non-stop push moshing, the ever growing circle pit and the constant stream of crowd surfers were not safe 10/10 concert but I would not go again they were super good live and I would definitely recommend didnt eat before the show and by the end i was half dead thank god in and out is open at 12 am i definitely want to go to more live music super nice in sf because a lot of bands stop here on tours thinking of going to see Knower in November i’ve been going to a friend’s zumba class my greatest enemy is still dance my cardio is getting better has living life on skates made anything involving regular footwork foreign?

item.title: So I Moved to California
item.description: June 2nd, 2025 The first in a series (hopefully) of short journal entries I started a new job in South Bay and finally escaped from Ottawa Things that have happened to me/things I’ve noticed in my first month here witnessed at least 4 people with the exact same shirt and one guy with the same shirt AND pants combo in the span of 30 minutes I need new clothes I need to stop shopping at Uniqlo at least I need to stop buying ALL my clothes from Uniqlo got taken to eat pho in the hood I watched an insane amount of people getting arrested from the window of my Uber and then my Uber stopped and let me out right in front of the altercation I also saw someone huffing Galaxy Gas for the first time almost got mauled by a dog on an SF bus at 10 pm at night after an One Okay Rock concert we got on the bus and sat down without realizing there was a scruffy looking dude with his giant dog sat across from us one of my friends was smart and noticed the dog so he stood at a safe distance and took photos his girlfriend did not give a fuck and sat down next to the dog myself and my other friend were incredibly locked in the entire bus ride trying not to draw aggro from the dog as it kept barking the owner tried his best to calm the dog down and at one point put his fist in the dog’s mouth to try to calm it down after the ride was over the friend sitting next to me told me he was staring the dog in the eyes the ENTIRE RIDE this makes a lot more sense as to why the dog was so pissed off for the entire duration of the ride this friend needs to be studied that same night i had the most amazing donuts at a 24 hr donut shop 24 hr donuts is a new concept to me the name of the place was Bob’s Donut Waymo is kind of insane in SF and i would recommend it over taking Ubers if only Waymo didn’t cost 2x the price of Uber the drivers here are really crazy within 48 hours of landing we almost got hit by a driver taking a left turn on a red i have witnessed at least half a dozen instances of drivers cutting the triangle because they were stuck on the lane leading to the off ramp in the same vein of thought, I noticed a stunning mentality difference when it comes to car purchases people in America (this is a sweeping generalization) often don’t care about fuel economy or utility as the first priority when buying a car they care more about whether the car will help them survive in an accident this is because they have come the to conclusion that they WILL get into an accident at some point and they want to keep living I’ve seen single people who don’t haul stuff drive massive SUVs solely because everyone else has a massive car too and they don’t want to be stuck holding the short end of the stick when a car runs a red and t-bones them I am going to need to go to gym if I keep eating so much free food my sleep schedule fixed itself I used to sleep at 3 am and wake up at like 11 am while I was on EST now I sleep at 12 and wake up at 8 which is perfect its been over a month and my body still hasn’t revered back to the shitty sleep so maybe I’m fixed either that or the blackout curtains I had in my room at home were destroying my circadian rhythm the weather here is incredibly foreign what do you mean that for the next 8 months there will be no rain at all and every day will be the exact same weather

item.title: The Blue Afternoon That Lasted Forever
item.description: Daniel H. Wilson A story I loved so much I had to transcribe it from William Flew’s Archive Science fiction is so intriguing because it can examine the cosmic and the infinitesimal, the future and the past, the human and the immesurable. Daniel H. Wilson’s story does all that, in less than four thousand words. “It’s late at night, my darling. And the stars are in the sky.
